data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Konstantinov, Alexander S. (2005): New species of Middle Asian Longitarsus Latreille with discussion of their subgeneric placement (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae). Zootaxa 1056: 19-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170096
